content: Community park in Choa Chu Kang, Singapore **Choa Chu Kang Park** is a community park in [Choa Chu Kang](/wiki/Choa_Chu_Kang), Singapore, located beside [Kranji Expressway](/wiki/Kranji_Expressway) and along Choa Chu Kang Drive. ## History In 1996, plans for a park to be built near Choa Chu Kang Drive were revealed under the Choa Chu Kang [Development Guide Plan](/wiki/Development_Guide_Plan). Choa Chu Kang Park was opened on November 11, 2000 by [Minister for National Development](/wiki/Minister_for_National_Development_(Singapore)) [Mah Bow Tan](/wiki/Mah_Bow_Tan). In 2014, a community garden was added. The plans were announced by [Minister of Health](/wiki/Ministry_of_Health_(Singapore)) [Gan Kim Yong](/wiki/Gan_Kim_Yong). In 2018, the fourth [National Parks Board](/wiki/National_Parks_Board) [Therapeutic Garden](/wiki/Therapeutic_garden) was opened in Choa Chu Kang Park. - [List of parks in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_parks_in_Singapore) - National Parks Board, Singapore - Choa Chu Kang Park 1°23′19″N 103°44′49″E﻿ / ﻿1.388497°N 103.746868°E﻿ / 1.388497; 103.746868﻿ (Choa Chu Kang Park) This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Choa Chu Kang Park
